entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.summary: Snow. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
